description: This header file provides function declarations for IP address utilities, including retrieving the local IPv4 address of a network interface, checking hostname resolvability, resolving a hostname to an IP address, and validating IP address formats (IPv4 and IPv6).
external_methods: icBuildtime.h (included but methods not specified in the header)

methods.name: getInterfaceIpAddressV4
methods.description: Returns the IPv4 address of the specified network interface; caller must free the returned string if not NULL.

methods.name: isHostnameResolvable
methods.description: Checks whether the given hostname can be resolved.

methods.name: resolveHostname
methods.description: Resolves a hostname to its IP address; caller must free the returned string.

methods.name: isValidIpAddress
methods.description: Validates whether the input string is a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.
